summary: Project involves a web page with a header and footer. User wants to fix the footer and add 4 images to it.
known_issues: Footer requires fixes and 4 images to be added
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Footer banner image 1 — decorative institutional/financial badge or emblem (footer-img-1.dim_200x80.png)
- Footer banner image 2 — decorative institutional/financial badge or emblem (footer-img-2.dim_200x80.png)
- Footer banner image 3 — decorative institutional/financial badge or emblem (footer-img-3.dim_200x80.png)
- Footer banner image 4 — decorative institutional/financial badge or emblem (footer-img-4.dim_200x80.png)

existing_features.title: Fix the footer layout and styling in the rendered document (both in PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts). Ensure the footer is properly aligned, has consistent padding/margins, and visually matches the overall document design.

Add 4 user-provided images to the footer area in the rendered document. Display the 4 images as static assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/) and render them horizontally in the footer row within both PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 4 user-provided images to the footer
